017package org.apache.juneau.json;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.IOUtils.*;
020
021import java.io.*;
022import java.lang.reflect.*;
023import java.nio.charset.*;
024import java.util.*;
025import java.util.function.*;
026
027import org.apache.juneau.*;

030import org.apache.juneau.serializer.*;
031import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
032import org.apache.juneau.swap.*;
033
034/**
035 * Session object that lives for the duration of a single use of {@link JsonSerializer}.
036 *
037 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
038 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not thread safe and is typically discarded after one use.
039 * </ul>
040 *
041 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
042 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JsonBasics">JSON Basics</a>
043 * </ul>
044 */
045public class JsonSerializerSession extends WriterSerializerSession {
046
047   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
048   // Static
049   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
050
051   /**
052    * Creates a new builder for this object.
053    *
054    * @param ctx The context creating this session.
055    * @return A new builder.
056    */
057   public static Builder create(JsonSerializer ctx) {
058      return new Builder(ctx);
059   }
060
061   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
062   // Builder
063   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
064
065   /**
066    * Builder class.
067    */
068   @FluentSetters
069   public static class Builder extends WriterSerializerSession.Builder {
070
071      JsonSerializer ctx;
072
073      /**
074       * Constructor
075       *
076       * @param ctx The context creating this session.
077       */
078      protected Builder(JsonSerializer ctx) {
079         super(ctx);
080         this.ctx = ctx;
081      }
082
083      @Override
084      public JsonSerializerSession build() {
085         return new JsonSerializerSession(this);
086      }
087
088      // <FluentSetters>
089
090      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
091      public <T> Builder apply(Class<T> type, Consumer<T> apply) {
092         super.apply(type, apply);
093         return this;
094      }
095
096      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
097      public Builder debug(Boolean value) {
098         super.debug(value);
099         return this;
100      }
101

106      }

112      }

118      }

140         super.mediaTypeDefault(value);

164         super.resolver(value);

166      }

169      public Builder schema(HttpPartSchema value) {
170         super.schema(value);
171         return this;
172      }

174      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerSession.Builder */
175      public Builder schemaDefault(HttpPartSchema value) {
176         super.schemaDefault(value);
177         return this;
178      }

181      public Builder uriContext(UriContext value) {
182         super.uriContext(value);
183         return this;
184      }

187      public Builder fileCharset(Charset value) {

198      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.serializer.WriterSerializerSession.Builder */

200         super.useWhitespace(value);
201         return this;
202      }

204      // </FluentSetters>

206
207   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
208   // Instance
209   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
210
211   private final JsonSerializer ctx;
212
213   /**
214    * Constructor.
215    *
216    * @param builder The builder for this object.
217    */
218   protected JsonSerializerSession(Builder builder) {
219      super(builder);
220      this.ctx = builder.ctx;
221   }
222
223   @Override /* SerializerSesssion */
224   protected void doSerialize(SerializerPipe out, Object o) throws IOException, SerializeException {
225      serializeAnything(getJsonWriter(out).i(getInitialDepth()), o, getExpectedRootType(o), "root", null);
226   }
227
228   /**
229    * Method that can be called from subclasses to serialize an object to JSON.
230    *
231    * <p>
232    * Used by {@link JsonSchemaSerializerSession} for serializing examples to JSON.
233    *
234    * @param o The object to serialize.
235    * @return The serialized object.
236    * @throws Exception Error occurred.
237    */
238   protected String serializeJson(Object o) throws Exception {
239      StringWriter sw = new StringWriter();
240      serializeAnything(getJsonWriter(createPipe(sw)).i(getInitialDepth()), o, getExpectedRootType(o), "root", null);
241      return sw.toString();
242   }
243
244   /**
245    * Workhorse method.
246    * Determines the type of object, and then calls the appropriate type-specific serialization method.
247    *
248    * @param out The output writer.
249    * @param o The object to serialize.
250    * @param eType The expected type.
251    * @param attrName The attribute name.
252    * @param pMeta The bean property currently being parsed.
253    * @return The same writer passed in.
254    * @throws SerializeException General serialization error occurred.
255    */
256   @SuppressWarnings({ "rawtypes" })
257   protected JsonWriter serializeAnything(JsonWriter out, Object o, ClassMeta<?> eType, String attrName, BeanPropertyMeta pMeta) throws SerializeException {
258
259      if (o == null) {
260         out.append("null");
261         return out;
262      }
263
264      if (eType == null)
265         eType = object();
266
267      ClassMeta<?> aType;        // The actual type
268      ClassMeta<?> sType;        // The serialized type
269
270      aType = push2(attrName, o, eType);
271      boolean isRecursion = aType == null;
272
273      // Handle recursion
274      if (aType == null) {
275         o = null;
276         aType = object();
277      }
278
279      // Handle Optional<X>
280      if (isOptional(aType)) {
281         o = getOptionalValue(o);
282         eType = getOptionalType(eType);
283         aType = getClassMetaForObject(o, object());
284      }
285
286      sType = aType;
287      String typeName = getBeanTypeName(this, eType, aType, pMeta);
288
289      // Swap if necessary
290      ObjectSwap swap = aType.getSwap(this);
291      if (swap != null) {
292         o = swap(swap, o);
293         sType = swap.getSwapClassMeta(this);
294
295         // If the getSwapClass() method returns Object, we need to figure out
296         // the actual type now.
297         if (sType.isObject())
298            sType = getClassMetaForObject(o);
299      }
300
301      String wrapperAttr = getJsonClassMeta(sType).getWrapperAttr();
302      if (wrapperAttr != null) {
303         out.w('{').cr(indent).attr(wrapperAttr).w(':').s(indent);
304         indent++;
305      }
306
307      // '\0' characters are considered null.
308      if (o == null || (sType.isChar() && ((Character)o).charValue() == 0)) {
309         out.append("null");
310      } else if (sType.isNumber() || sType.isBoolean()) {
311         out.append(o);
312      } else if (sType.isBean()) {
313         serializeBeanMap(out, toBeanMap(o), typeName);
314      } else if (sType.isUri() || (pMeta != null && pMeta.isUri())) {
315         out.uriValue(o);
316      } else if (sType.isMap()) {
317         if (o instanceof BeanMap)
318            serializeBeanMap(out, (BeanMap)o, typeName);
319         else
320            serializeMap(out, (Map)o, eType);
321      } else if (sType.isCollection()) {
322         serializeCollection(out, (Collection) o, eType);
323      } else if (sType.isArray()) {
324         serializeCollection(out, toList(sType.getInnerClass(), o), eType);
325      } else if (sType.isReader()) {
326         pipe((Reader)o, out, SerializerSession::handleThrown);
327      } else if (sType.isInputStream()) {
328         pipe((InputStream)o, out, SerializerSession::handleThrown);
329      } else {
330         out.stringValue(toString(o));
331      }
332
333      if (wrapperAttr != null) {
334         indent--;
335         out.cre(indent-1).w('}');
336      }
337
338      if (! isRecursion)
339         pop();
340      return out;
341   }
342
343   @SuppressWarnings({ "rawtypes", "unchecked" })
344   private SerializerWriter serializeMap(JsonWriter out, Map m, ClassMeta<?> type) throws SerializeException {
345
346      ClassMeta<?> keyType = type.getKeyType(), valueType = type.getValueType();
347
348      int i = indent;
349      out.w('{');
350
351      Flag addComma = Flag.create();
352      forEachEntry(m, x -> {
353         addComma.ifSet(()->out.w(',').smi(i)).set();
354         Object value = x.getValue();
355         Object key = generalize(x.getKey(), keyType);
356         out.cr(i).attr(toString(key)).w(':').s(i);
357         serializeAnything(out, value, valueType, (key == null ? null : toString(key)), null);
358      });
359
360      out.cre(i-1).w('}');
361
362      return out;
363   }
364
365   private SerializerWriter serializeBeanMap(JsonWriter out, BeanMap<?> m, String typeName) throws SerializeException {
366      int i = indent;
367      out.w('{');
368
369      Flag addComma = Flag.create();
370      Predicate<Object> checkNull = x -> isKeepNullProperties() || x != null;
371
372      if (typeName != null) {
373         BeanPropertyMeta pm = m.getMeta().getTypeProperty();
374         out.cr(i).attr(pm.getName()).w(':').s(i).stringValue(typeName);
375         addComma.set();
376      }
377
378      m.forEachValue(checkNull, (pMeta,key,value,thrown) -> {
379         ClassMeta<?> cMeta = pMeta.getClassMeta();
380         if (thrown != null)
381            onBeanGetterException(pMeta, thrown);
382
383         if (canIgnoreValue(cMeta, key, value))
384            return;
385
386         addComma.ifSet(()->out.append(',').smi(i)).set();
387
388         out.cr(i).attr(key).w(':').s(i);
389
390         serializeAnything(out, value, cMeta, key, pMeta);
391      });
392
393      out.cre(i-1).w('}');
394      return out;
395   }
396
397   @SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes", "unchecked"})
398   private SerializerWriter serializeCollection(JsonWriter out, Collection c, ClassMeta<?> type) throws SerializeException {
399
400      ClassMeta<?> elementType = type.getElementType();
401
402      out.w('[');
403      Flag addComma = Flag.create();
404      forEachEntry(c, x -> {
405         addComma.ifSet(()->out.w(',').smi(indent)).set();
406         out.cr(indent);
407         serializeAnything(out, x, elementType, "<iterator>", null);
408      });
409
410      out.cre(indent-1).w(']');
411      return out;
412   }
413
414   /**
415    * Converts the specified output target object to an {@link JsonWriter}.
416    *
417    * @param out The output target object.
418    * @return The output target object wrapped in an {@link JsonWriter}.
419    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
420    */
421   protected final JsonWriter getJsonWriter(SerializerPipe out) throws IOException {
422      Object output = out.getRawOutput();
423      if (output instanceof JsonWriter)
424         return (JsonWriter)output;
425      JsonWriter w = new JsonWriter(out.getWriter(), isUseWhitespace(), getMaxIndent(), isEscapeSolidus(), getQuoteChar(),
426         isSimpleAttrs(), isTrimStrings(), getUriResolver());
427      out.setWriter(w);
428      return w;
429   }
430
431   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
432   // Properties
433   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
434
435   /**
436    * Add <js>"_type"</js> properties when needed.
437    *
438    * @see JsonSerializer.Builder#addBeanTypesJson()
439    * @return
440    *    <jk>true</jk> if <js>"_type"</js> properties will be added to beans if their type cannot be inferred
441    *    through reflection.
442    */
443   @Override
444   protected final boolean isAddBeanTypes() {
445      return ctx.isAddBeanTypes();
446   }
447
448   /**
449    * Prefix solidus <js>'/'</js> characters with escapes.
450    *
451    * @see JsonSerializer.Builder#escapeSolidus()
452    * @return
453    *    <jk>true</jk> if solidus (e.g. slash) characters should be escaped.
454    */
455   protected final boolean isEscapeSolidus() {
456      return ctx.isEscapeSolidus();
457   }
458
459   /**
460    * Simple JSON attributes.
461    *
462    * @see JsonSerializer.Builder#simpleAttrs()
463    * @return
464    *    <jk>true</jk> if JSON attribute names will only be quoted when necessary.
465    *    <br>Otherwise, they are always quoted.
466    */
467   protected final boolean isSimpleAttrs() {
468      return ctx.isSimpleAttrs();
469   }
470
471   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
472   // Extended metadata
473   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
474
475   /**
476    * Returns the language-specific metadata on the specified class.
477    *
478    * @param cm The class to return the metadata on.
479    * @return The metadata.
480    */
481   protected JsonClassMeta getJsonClassMeta(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
482      return ctx.getJsonClassMeta(cm);
483   }
484}
